body: 自己找的牛头人这种苦主我完全不可怜，甚至想拆cp
I would like a plot twist like this in his ntr manga would be less disapointed
If you are reading this comment, your fate will be recovered from any curses and you will also gain immunity from any curses for the next 200 years (also work on your next generations)

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse
